channel.title: The Ramayan Podcast
channel.description: The Ramayan Podcast is an episodic reading of Sri Tulsidas's Ramacharitramanas, a popular version of the Ramayana.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Ramayan Podcast is an episodic reading of Sri Tulsidas's Ramacharitramanas
channel.itunes:summary: The Ramayan Podcast is an episodic reading of Sri Tulsidas's Ramacharitramanas, a popular version of the Ramayana
channel.itunes:author: Tulsidas
channel.itunes:keywords: ramayana, ramayan, hindu, epic, tulsidas, rama, sita, scripture, hinduism, sanatana dharma

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 1
item.description: A 30-minute segment from BalKand, the first book of the Ramayan, telling stories which preface the birth of Lord Rama.

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 2
item.description: The conclusion of the story of King Pratapabanu and his rebirth as the demon king Ravana

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 3
item.description: The birth of Lord Rama

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 4
item.description: Rama and Lakshman's journey with the sage Vishvamitra.
item.itunes:subtitle: Rama and Lakshman's journey with the sage Vishvamitra.
item.itunes:summary: Rama and his brothers grow and study; the sage Vishvamitra asks King Dasharatha for Rama and Lakshman's help. The two brothers destroy the forest demons and travel with the sage to Mithila.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 5
item.description: In Mithila, Ram first encounters Sita.
item.itunes:subtitle: In Mithila, Ram first encounters Sita
item.itunes:summary: Rama and Lakshman tour Mithila, visiting the location of the upcoming bow sacrifice. In the garden, Rama and Sita see each other for the first time.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 6
item.description: Rama breaks the bow of Shiva and wins Sita's hand.
item.itunes:subtitle: Rama breaks the bow of Shiva and wins Sita's hand.
item.itunes:summary: Rama attends the bow sacrifice, breaks the bow and wins Sita's hand. Rama and Lakshman then encounter Parasurama.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 7
item.description: The confrontation with Parasurama; preparations for the wedding
item.itunes:subtitle: The confrontation with Parasurama; preparations for the wedding
item.itunes:summary: Lakshman confronts Parasurama; King Janaka begins preparations for the wedding and messengers are dispatched to King Dasharatha.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Rama, Sita, Vishvamitra, Ramayana, Parasurama, Dasharatha

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 8
item.description: Dasharatha travels to Mithila for the wedding.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dasharatha journeys to Mithila
item.itunes:summary: Dasharatha journeys to Mithila for the wedding of Rama and Sita
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 9
item.description: The wedding of Rama and Sita
item.itunes:subtitle: The wedding of Rama and Sita
item.itunes:summary: Rama and Sita are married in Mithila. Bharat, Lakshman and Shatrugna are also wed.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 10
item.description: Rama and family return to Ayodhya
item.itunes:subtitle: Rama and family return to Ayodhya
item.itunes:summary: After much festivity, the court of Dasharatha, including Rama, his brothers, and their new wives, return to Ayodhya.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Rama, Sita, Dasharatha, Janak, Ayodhya, Mithila

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 11
item.description: The bridal party is welcomed; the end of the Bal Kand
item.itunes:subtitle: The bridal party is welcomed; the end of the Bal Kand
item.itunes:summary: The festivities continue in Ayodhya; we reach the end of the Bal Kand (Book 1 of the Ramayana).
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 12
item.description: The beginning of the Ayodhya Kand. Dasharatha decides to make Rama his regent.
item.itunes:subtitle: The beginning of the Ayodhya Kand. Dasharatha decides to make Rama his regent.
item.itunes:summary: Dasharatha decides to make Rama his Regent. Preparations begin; Queen Kaikeyi's maidservant hatches her plot.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Rama, Sita, Dasharatha,, Ayodhya, Kaikeyi, Coronation

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 13
item.description: Queen Kaikeyi claims her two boons from King Dasharatha
item.itunes:subtitle: Queen Kaikeyi claims her two boons from King Dasharatha
item.itunes:summary: As Ayodhya prepares for Rama's coronation, Queen Kaikeyi makes a startling demand
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 14
item.description: Ram prepares for exile, speaking with Kausalya and Sita
item.itunes:subtitle: Ram prepares for exile, speaking with Kausalya and Sita
item.itunes:summary: To the dismay of all, Ram prepares for exile. He hears the pleas of Kausalya and Sita
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 15
item.description: Rama, Sita, and Lakshman leave Ayodhya
item.itunes:subtitle: Rama, Sita, and Lakshman leave Ayodhya
item.itunes:summary: Rama leaves Ayodhya, accompanied by Sita and his brother Lakshman
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 16
item.description: The two Princes and Sita ferry across the Ganges and journey to Prayag
item.itunes:subtitle: The two Princes and Sita ferry across the Ganges and journey to Prayag
item.itunes:summary: After leaving Sumantra, the trio encounter a ferryman who takes them across the Ganga. They journey to Prayag and meet the great sage, Bharadvaja
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 17
item.description: Rama, Sita and Lakshman meet the sage Valmiki and travel to Chitrakuta
item.itunes:subtitle: Rama, Sita and Lakshman meet the sage Valmiki and travel to Chitrakuta
item.itunes:summary: Rama, Sita and Lakshman meet the sage Valmiki and travel to Chitrakuta
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 18
item.description: Sumantra returns to Ayodhya and reports to the King.
item.itunes:subtitle: Sumantra returns to Ayodhya and reports to the King.
item.itunes:summary: Sumantra returns to Ayodhya and reports to the King. Dasharatha leaves his body; Bharata returns to Ayodhya and confronts his mother.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 19
item.description: Bharata rejects the throne and decides to find Rama in the forest.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bharata rejects the throne and decides to find Rama in the forest
item.itunes:summary: Bharata performs the funeral rites for his father, rejects the throne and decides to find Rama in the forest.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 20
item.description: Bharat begins his expedition into the forest.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bharat begins his expedition into the forest.
item.itunes:summary: Bharat begins his expedition into the forest., and meets the sage Bharadvaja at Prayag
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Rama, Sita, Bharat, Ayodhya, Prayag, Bharadvaja

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 21
item.description: Bharat is the guest of the sage Bharadvaja at Prayag, then continues his search for Rama.
item.itunes:subtitle: Bharat is the guest of the sage Bharadvaja at Prayag, then continues his search for Rama.
item.itunes:summary: Bharat is the guest of the sage Bharadvaja at Prayag, then continues his search for Rama.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Ramayana, Rama, Sita, Bharat, forest, journey, epic

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 22
item.description: Bharata's party reaches Rama, Sita and Lakshman
item.itunes:subtitle: Bharata's party reaches Rama, Sita and Lakshman
item.itunes:summary: Bharata's party reaches Rama, Sita and Lakshman
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Bharat, Rama, Sita, Lakshman, Ramayana, Chitrakut

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 23
item.description: Will Shri Rama return to Ayodhya?
item.itunes:subtitle: Will Shri Rama return to Ayodhya?
item.itunes:summary: Bharata tries to find away to convince Rama to leave the forest and return home. He confers with Vashishta, and together they meet with Rama.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Ramayana, Rama, Sita, Lakshman, Bharat, Shatrugna, Chitrakut, Epic, Hindu

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 24
item.description: King Janak arrives in the forest.
item.itunes:subtitle: King Janak arrives in the forest.
item.itunes:summary: King Janak arrives and confers with Shri Rama and Vashistha. The queens discuss the fate of Sita and Rama and Bharat.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 25
item.description: A decision is made; Rama gives Bharat his command.
item.itunes:subtitle: A decision is made; Rama commands Bharat
item.itunes:summary: Will Bharat stay in the forest with Rama or return to Ayodhya to rule?
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 26
item.description: Bharat obeys Rama's command and returns to Ayodhya
item.itunes:subtitle: Bharat obeys Rama's command and returns to Ayodhya
item.itunes:summary: Bharat visits holy places in the forest with the sage Atri. He then obeys Rama's command and returns to Ayodhya. Janak returns to Mithila.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Rama, Bharat, sandals, Ayodhya, Chitrakut, Lakshman, Sita,

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 27
item.description: The end of the Ayodhya Kand (Book 2 of the Ramayan)
item.itunes:subtitle: The end of the Ayodhya Kand
item.itunes:summary: The end of the Ayodhya Kand (Book Two of the Ramayana. Bharat in Ayodhya.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Ayodhya, Ayodhya Kand, Bharat, Rama, Ramayana

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 28
item.description: The beginning of the Aranya Kand, Book 3 of the Ramayana
item.itunes:subtitle: The beginning of the Aranya Kand, Book 3 of the Ramayana
item.itunes:summary: The beginning of the Aranya Kand. Rama, Sita and Lakshman leave Chitrakut and visit a number of forest sages. Rama makes a holy vow to destroy the demons.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 29
item.description: Ravana kidnaps Sita!
item.itunes:subtitle: Ravana kidnaps Sita!
item.itunes:summary: Rama and Lakshman meet Ravana's sister, Surparnaka, then defeat her brothers Kara and Dushana. Ravana seeks revenge and kidnaps Sita!
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 30
item.description: Rama begins his search for Sita.
item.itunes:subtitle: Rama begins his search for Sita.
item.itunes:summary: Rama and Lakshman begin searching for Sita. They meet Jatayu, and Rama discourses to Lakshman and Narada.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 31
item.description: The beginning of the Kishkinda Kand. Rama and Lakshman meet Hanuman and Sugriva.
item.itunes:subtitle: The beginning of the Kishkinda Kand. Rama and Lakshman meet Hanuman and Sugriva.
item.itunes:summary: The beginning of the Kishkinda Kand. Rama and Lakshman meet Hanuman and Sugriva. Rama helps Sugriva, and later receives the monkey king's help.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Rama, Lakshman, Hanuman, Sugriva, Kishkinda Kand

item.title: Ramayan Podcast Episode 32
item.description: The end of the Kishkinda Kand. Hanuman learns the whereabouts of Sita!
item.itunes:subtitle: The end of the Kishkinda Kand. Hanuman learns the whereabouts of Sita!
item.itunes:summary: The end of the Kishkinda Kand. After a long search, Hanuman, Angada, and Jambavan learn the whereabouts of Sita!
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Ramayan, Kishkinda Kand, Hanuman, Rama, Sita

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 33
item.description: The beginning of the Sundar Kand. Hanuman flies to Lanka and meets Sita.
item.itunes:subtitle: The beginning of the Sundar Kand. Hanuman flies to Lanka to find Sita
item.itunes:summary: Hanuman flies across the sea to Lanka. He meets Vibhishana and then finds Sita in the Ashoka grove. Hanuman delivers Rama's message.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
item.itunes:keywords: Hanuman, Ramayana, Rama, Sita, Ravana, Lanka

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 34
item.description: Hanuman is captured. The burning of Lanka, Rama's army marches to the sea, and Ravana rejects sage advice.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Burning of Lanka
item.itunes:summary: Hanuman is captured. The burning of Lanka, Rama's army marches to the sea, and Ravana rejects sage advice.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas

item.title: Ramayan Podcast, Episode 35
item.description: The end of the Sundar Kand.
item.itunes:subtitle: The end of the Sundar Kand. Vibishan leaves Lanka, Ravana sends spies.
item.itunes:summary: The end of the Sundar Kand. Vibishan leaves Lanka, Ravana sends spies. They report; Ravana is not moved.
item.itunes:author: Tulsidas
